                    +--be.ac.kuleuven.cs.ips2.project2002.logicCircuits.Or
public class Or
extends ManyInputs

A logic gate that represents the OR of many inputs.

Initially, the boolean value of an instance is true. The boolean value changes when inputs are added or removed, or when a input circuit changes its boolean value.

Note: No invariant of the form: getValue() == (exists LogicCircuit lc in getInputs(): lc.getValue() == true); A public invariant of the form of this form is expected, but cannot be provided. It would mean that we have to make sure that our value is updated as soon as the value of our inputs is updated. If the value of the inputs is updated, and we are not, this invariant would be violated. This can be solved, but this is not done in this project.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Jan Dockx

inputAdded

protected final void inputAdded(LogicCircuit input)
Description copied from class: ManyInputs

This method is called by ManyInputs.addInput(LogicCircuit) when input is added to the set of inputs. Subclasses should implement this method to update the boolean value of this to reflect the extra input.
